definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: Of long standing, Confucianism is the core of Chinese Culture.
sentences.chinese: 儒家思想渊远流长，构成中国民族文化的核心。

sentences.english: Daye, it has a long history and goes back.
sentences.chinese: 大冶，历史悠久，渊远流长。

sentences.english: Figure painting in Chinese Ink Traditions has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 水墨人物画有着渊远的历史。

sentences.english: Screen as an integral part of traditional furniture goes back to ancient history.
sentences.chinese: 屏风作为传统家具中不可或缺的部分历史渊远。

sentences.english: The historical relationship between the Japanese and Hainan can date back to a time long ago.
sentences.chinese: 历史上日本人和海南岛之间的关系渊远流长。

sentences.english: The culture of geomancy has a long history in China, and still exerts influence there today.
sentences.chinese: 中国的风水文化渊远流长，至今仍可见其影响。

sentences.english: China has a long history, its ancient art of cooking long known.
sentences.chinese: 中国历史悠久，其烹饪艺术渊远流长，闻名于世。

definition: lit. source is distant and the flow is long (idiom); fig. sth goes back to the dim and distant past/a lot of water has flowed under the bridge since then
passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down
to give rise to (sth good)/to emanate from
(of watercourses) source and direction of flow/origin and development
tradition or style from the past/old ways/surviving tradition/relic
deposits accumulated over long periods/fig. valuable experience, accumulated wisdom
